00009 ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter::ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter(string treeName) :
00010 ORVTreeWriter(new ORTek754DScopeDataDecoder, treeName)
00011 {
00012   fScopeDataDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORTek754DScopeDataDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00013   fOwnsDecoder = true;
00014   fGPIBAddress = 0;
00015   fChannel = 0;
00016   fNData = 0;
00017   for (int i=0; i<kMaxNData; i++) {
00018     fData[i] = 0;
00019     fI[i] = i;
00020   }
00021 }

00023 ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter::ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter(ORTek754DScopeDataDecoder* decoder, string treeName) :
00024 ORVTreeWriter(decoder, treeName)
00025 {
00026   fScopeDataDecoder = decoder;
00027   fOwnsDecoder = false;
00028   fGPIBAddress = 0;
00029   fChannel = 0;
00030   fNData = 0;
00031   for (int i=0; i<kMaxNData; i++) {
00032     fData[i] = 0;
00033     fI[i] = i;
00034   }
00035 }

00038 ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter::~ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter()
00039 {
00040   if(fOwnsDecoder) delete fScopeDataDecoder;
00041 }

00043 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00044 {
00045   fTree->Branch("gpibadd", &fGPIBAddress, "gpibadd/I");
00046   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/I");
00047   fTree->Branch("n", &fNData, "n/I");
00048   fTree->Branch("data", fData, "data[n]/I");
00049   fTree->Branch("i", fI, "i[n]/I");
00050   return kSuccess;
00051 }
00052 
00053 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTek754DScopeDataTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00054 {
00055   // check severity to improve speed
00056   if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00057     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): got one: "
00058                   << "gpibadd-ch-n = " 
00059                   << fScopeDataDecoder->GPIBAddressOf(record) << "-"
00060                   << fScopeDataDecoder->ChannelOf(record) << "-" 
00061                   << fScopeDataDecoder->NDataOf(record) << endl;
00062   }
00063 
00064   fGPIBAddress = fScopeDataDecoder->GPIBAddressOf(record);
00065   fChannel = fScopeDataDecoder->ChannelOf(record);
00066   fNData = fScopeDataDecoder->NDataOf(record);
00067   if (fNData > kMaxNData) {
00068     ORLog(kWarning) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): fNData (=" << fNData
00069                     << ") > kMaxNData (=" << kMaxNData << "); "
00070                     << "suggest increasing kMaxNData..." << endl;
00071     fNData = kMaxNData;
00072   }
00073   for (int i=0; i<fNData; i++) {
00074     fData[i] = fScopeDataDecoder->IthDataOf(record, i);
00075     if(fData[i] > 128 || fData[i] < -128) {
00076       ORLog(kWarning) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): data point " << i
00077                       << "was out-of-range: = " << fData[i] << endl;
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00081   return kSuccess;
00082 }
